Package com.ntu.scse

Class GuestMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.GuestMgr

  • public class GuestMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a hotel Guest Manager that contains a list of all guests as well as methods for manipulating those guests. One GuestManager can contain many Guests.
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GuestMgr​(java.util.ArrayList guest)
      Creates a Guest Manager based on loaded data from a file.

      Tries to create a new Guest with the given guest details.
      boolean checkGuestExist​(int guestID)
      Checks if a given guest ID exists in the master guest list
      Guest createNewGuest​()
      Asks the user for relevant information required for creating a new guest before proceeding to create the new guest

      Gets the guest ID given the guest's first and last name

      Gets the guest first and last name given the guest's id

      Gets the number of guests in the hotel
      void mainGuestView​(ReservationMgr rm)
      Shows the main menu for all guest-related operations such as Creating a new guest Updating guest details Searching for guests Removing guests Viewing all guests Refreshes Guest list (sorts based on guest ID) after every operation
      Guest readGuestInfo​(int guestID)
      Prints out a guest's first and last name based on a given guest ID, and returns the Guest object

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuestMgr

        public GuestMgr​(java.util.ArrayList guest)
        Creates a Guest Manager based on loaded data from a file. If no previous data was present, initialize 10 default guests.
        Parameters:
        guest - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.

    • Method Detail

      • readGuestInfo

        public Guest readGuestInfo​(int guestID)
        Prints out a guest's first and last name based on a given guest ID, and returns the Guest object
        Parameters:
        guestID - the ID of the guest
        Returns:
        returns the Guest object if a match is found

      • getIDfromName

        public int getIDfromName​(java.lang.String lastName,
                         java.lang.String firstName)
        Gets the guest ID given the guest's first and last name
        Parameters:
        lastName - the last name of the guest
        firstName - the first name of the guest
        Returns:
        returns the Guest's ID

      • getNamefromID

        public java.lang.String getNamefromID​(int id)
        Gets the guest first and last name given the guest's id
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the guest
        Returns:
        returns the Guest's first and last name

      • searchGuest

        public Guest searchGuest​(int guestID)
        Prints out a guest's full details based on a given guest ID, and returns the Guest object
        Parameters:
        guestID - the ID of the guest
        Returns:
        returns the Guest object if a match is found

      • searchGuest

        public Guest searchGuest​(java.lang.String firstName)
        Prints out a guest's first and last name based on a given guest first name, and returns the Guest object. If more than 1 have the same first name, prompt user to enter guest's last name as well.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the guest
        Returns:
        returns the Guest object if a match is found

      • readGuestList

        public void readGuestList​()
        Prints out the entire guest list.

      • addNewGuest

        public Guest addNewGuest​(java.lang.String firstName,
                         java.lang.String lastName,
                         char gender,
                         java.lang.String creditCardNo,
                         java.lang.String address,
                         java.lang.String country,
                         java.lang.String idType,
                         java.lang.String idNumber)
        Tries to create a new Guest with the given guest details. Gets a new unique identifier automatically
        Parameters:
        firstName - The Guest first name
        lastName - The Guest last name
        gender - The Guest gender
        creditCardNo - The Guest credit card number
        address - The Guest address
        country - The Guest country
        idType - The Guest identification document type
        idNumber - The Guest national identification number
        Returns:
        returns the newly created guest

      • checkGuestExist

        public boolean checkGuestExist​(int guestID)
        Checks if a given guest ID exists in the master guest list
        Parameters:
        guestID - the guest ID
        Returns:
        returns true if the guest exists, else false

      • removeGuest

        public void removeGuest​(int guestID)
        Removes a guest from the master list
        Parameters:
        guestID - the guest ID

      • saveToFile

        public java.util.List<Guest> saveToFile​()
        Gives the master list back to main to write to file
        Returns:
        the master guest list

      • mainGuestView

        public void mainGuestView​(ReservationMgr rm)
        Shows the main menu for all guest-related operations such as Creating a new guest Updating guest details Searching for guests Removing guests Viewing all guests Refreshes Guest list (sorts based on guest ID) after every operation
        Parameters:
        rm - The reservation manager object

      • updateGuestByID

        public void updateGuestByID​(int guestID)
        Shows the menu for updating guest details. Details of a guest that can be updated are: First and Last name Gender Credit card number Billing address Country Identification document type National identification number
        Parameters:
        guestID - The unique identifier of the guest

      • createNewGuest

        public Guest createNewGuest​()
        Asks the user for relevant information required for creating a new guest before proceeding to create the new guest
        Returns:
        returns the newly created Guest

      • getNumGuest

        public int getNumGuest​()
        Gets the number of guests in the hotel
        Returns:
        returns the number of guests in the hotel
